name: JETSTREAM Aviation Academy
about: JETSTREAM Aviation Academy is a well-established Approved Training Organisation (ATO) and certified Flight and Type Rating Training Organisation (FTO/TRTO) under EASA regulations. With 25 years of experience in aviation training, the academy operates two main training centers in Athens, Greece, and Dubai, UAE. It offers a comprehensive range of courses, including the Airline First Officer course with ATPL and type ratings for aircraft such as the A320, A330, B737, and more. Additional training programs include TRI/SFI courses, MCC, helicopter pilot training, aircraft maintenance engineering, and cabin crew training. JETSTREAM regularly conducts selection and training for major airlines and aviation entities globally, ensuring high-quality training to meet the demands of the aviation industry. The academy is known for its motivated staff, high-standard facilities, and commitment to delivering exceptional training.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Multi-Pilot License (MPL)
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Multi-Crew Cooperation Course (MCC)
Jet Orientation Course (JOT)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School
EASA ATPL Ab Initio"]
